featured_projects.name: Network Vulnerability Checker
featured_projects.description: A beginner-friendly cybersecurity tool that scans a small network for open ports and reports basic vulnerabilities.

featured_projects.name: Modern Family House 3D Model
featured_projects.description: 3D model of a modern family house created in SketchUp and Rhino 3D, with detailed interior and exterior visualization.

featured_projects.name: Cozy Apartment Interior Design
featured_projects.description: Junior-level interior design project for a cozy apartment using AutoDesk Revit and Adobe Photoshop for realistic renderings.

featured_projects.name: Luxury Villa Project
featured_projects.description: A junior-friendly luxury villa showcasing floor plans, 3D exterior modeling, and landscape design using Revit, SketchUp, and Rhino 3D.

featured_projects.name: Commercial Office Blueprint
featured_projects.description: 2D and 3D floor plans for a small commercial office building. Designs created in AutoDesk Revit with presentation visuals enhanced in Adobe Illustrator and InDesign.
